attributes.action: Decrease the GM council's english requierment for foreigner doctors from b to c+
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament can discuss this issue and can recomend it  to be started by gmc as the nurses' engliah requirment 

To fill the decrease of the doctors in NHS especially during corona crises 

Thank you
attributes.background:
Now the english REQUIREMENTS of GMC to register forigner doctors is to have b in oet or 
as we need more and more doctors, espcially during covid crises ,we can solve one of the problems facing forginer doctors and taking more effort of them by decreasing english requirements to c+ or 3Bs one c+

rejection.details:
The English language requirements for doctors are set by the independent regulator for doctors in the UK, the General Medical Council (GMC), not the Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to investigate how to reduce barriers to non-UK medical professionals from joining the NHS.
